title: Riot support sends me to my ISP regarding issues
body:
ISP sends me back to Riot support. oh the cycle. twice so far.

so far lets see. Reseted and powercycled all network devices. I tried all the fixes in Riot websites. I talked to the support persons here. and on Riot support ticket website. they were very helpful. but it seems nobody has any idea how to fix my high packet loss that's been going on for a cpl weeks now.

replies.body:
Looking into this  I do see that you and a specialist dug into this pretty deep and found a potential issue through your ISP.  The 'cycle' freakin sucks and I'm sorry that it seems to be happening for you.  

Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so you can have a specialist dedicated to you who can continue helping individually with your issue.  

Chat is good for some quick troubleshooting, but I prefer you have someone stuck on you until this gets figured out.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
